content: a beautiful shawl designed to use tiny skeins featured in the trailhead yarns naughty or nice yarn calendar of 2021 it also works great for using up other mini skeins scraps gradient packs etc of your favorite fingering weight and sock yarns this pattern is a bit of a recipe the shawl is knit sideways on a bias with a small cable detail twelve lace charts are included and you can mix and match repeat the ones you love and eliminate the ones you don t make it your own wrap yourself in a rainbow naughty or nice calendars available for purchase at https //trailhead-yarns myshopify com/
